alliances: Marvel Super Hero Contest of Champions
description: The Collective Man (Sun, Chang, Ho, Lin, and Han Tao-Yu) is a fictional character, a Chinese superhero in the Marvel Comics universe. The Collective Man is actually an identity shared by the Tao-Yu brothers, a set of quintuplets. They possess the mutant power to merge into one body, which variously possesses the collective abilities of all five men or of all of the people of China. The brothers also share a psychic/spiritual link that allows them to telepathically communicate and teleport to one another.
name: Collective Man
powers: Ability to temporarily increase the limits these powers by mentally drawing upon outside energy
teleport to each other via psychic/spiritual-link.
Ability to merge into a single being possessing five times the physical
mental ability of a single Tao-Yu brother
